## Pseudocode

```pseudocode
#| label: alg-quicksort
#| html-indent-size: "1.2em"
#| html-comment-delimiter: "//"
#| html-line-number: true
#| html-line-number-punc: ":"
#| html-no-end: false
#| pdf-placement: "htb!"
#| pdf-line-number: true

\begin{algorithm}
\caption{Breadth First Search}
\begin{algorithmic}
\Procedure {BFS}{$pmid$} \Comment{pmid: PubMed ID}
\State $root \gets \text{Node}(pmid)$
\State $root.\text{depth} \gets 0$
\State $queue \gets \text{Queue}()$
\State $queue.\text{enqueue}(root)$
\State $visited \gets \{\}$
\Repeat
    \State $node \gets queue.\text{dequeue}()$
    \State $visited.\text{add}(node)$
    \State $depth \gets node.\text{depth}$ + 1
    \State $citations \gets \text{Efetch}(node.\text{pmid})$
    \For{$citation \in citations$}
        \State $child \gets \text{Node}(citation)$
        \State $child.\text{depth} \gets depth$
        \State $node.\text{add}(child)$
        \If{$child \notin visited$}
            \State $queue.\text{enqueue}(child)$
        \EndIf
    \EndFor
\Until{$queue.\text{isEmpty}()$ or $depth > MAX\_DEPTH$}
\EndProcedure
\end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
```
